reference.shortdesc: The figurelist element references a topic containing a list of figures in the book.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: It indicates to the processing software that the author wants a list of figures generated at the particular location. If no href attribute is specified on the figurelist element, an external processormight generate a list of figures at this location.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The figurelist element is specialized from topicref; it is defined in the bookmap module.
